question:
You have seen an advertisement in Australian magazines for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six-year-old child
write a letter
# Explain why you would like this
# Give detail of why you are a suitable person to employ
# Say how would you spend your free time while you are in Australia
text: I am writing this letter to express my concern about the advertisement for taking care of a 6-year child.

Since I have seen this, I have been so glad that eventually, I found an opportunity to get some practical experience in nursing outside my country. Moreover, I will also have a chance to meet and spend special time with a foreign family to observe closely and learn more about their culture, tradition and language.

I think I am perfect a candidate for this job. I have done my bachelor's degree in nursing and have a vast experience of about 6 years in this field. In addition, I achieved the award of "The best caretaker of the year" last year from the National Health department because of my responsiveness and decent behaviour. Furthermore, I looked after more than 50 people including from 6-month-old babies to 60-year-old people.

If I get this job I would love to pursue some international course in nursing or do a diploma along with it to grab more knowledge. Besides that, I will join a sports club in my leisure time to stay fit and healthy.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
